Darkfate::

"Well" said the male "Orchestra, welcome our faction; Blacknightmare 
will show you your quarters... Welcome with Predacons"

The doors opened and Blacknighmare appeared.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Orchestra::
> 
>       Composer quickly follows Wheeljack.
> 
>       "So, if you don't mind, can you fill me on on what's done so 
far?" He asked.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Orchestra smiles as his skills are complimented.
> 
>         "Well, I'll do my best to serve you," He said in his 
trustworthy voice.
